text: Today on the West Coast, it's looking good with 3 ft @9s WNW swell and light E winds at 11 mph. Ardnave Bay and Saligo Bay are the top picks, offering clean conditions throughout the day. Tomorrow, the swell drops to 2 ft @8s NW with fresh E winds at 17 mph, making it less favorable. Day after, similar 2 ft @8s NW conditions persist, but still not ideal. Best: today.
